description: Mutual aid and automatic aid agreements between fire/EMS agencies defining resource sharing terms and cost arrangements.

records.seo_costSharingTerms: Requesting agency reimburses at $150/hour per apparatus after first 2 hours. Personnel costs covered by providing agency.
records.seo_terms: Each agency agrees to provide up to 2 apparatus and associated personnel when requested. Maximum deployment duration 24 hours per request. Requesting agency provides fuel for deployed apparatus.

City EMS provides automatic ALS transport for all Metro Fire incidents requiring EMS. Metro Fire provides first responder BLS until EMS arrival. No cost recovery â€” funded through shared county tax levy.
